title: Lead reserves worldwide by country 2019
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Reserves in million metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Reserves in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country Australia and lowest at Country Other countries.
The minimum Country Other countries has got 3600000000000.0 times less Reserves in million metric tons than the maximum Country Australia.
